column4: How can I switch from graphical boot to text so I can see why LiveCD is hanging burring boot
If the LiveCD is not working, there isn't going to be much you can do to force it to work.  Have you tried using the Alternate CD to install Ubuntu?
No I did not. What is Alt CD? I am using 8.10 Beta 64 right now on Asus P5Q Delux
1) Intrepid Help is in #ubuntu+1, 2) its a version that is not a live cd, just for install.
